General.Name: Jinko Power Technology Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Jinko Power Technology Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an clean energy supplier and service provider. The company's photovoltaic power generation business comprises centralized, industrial and commercial distributed, and household distributed photovoltaics. Its products and services include electricity transaction, energy storage, PV hydrogen production, industry decarburization, virtual power plant, and carbon trading and carbon finance. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
